oracle.iam.identity.dbs.integration.openfire

Interface Database.OIM.Feature

  • Enclosing interface:
    Database.OIM

    public static interface Database.OIM.Feature

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ENFORCE_AUTO_COMMIT
      Attribute tag which must be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify that the JDBC Auto Commit feature needs stay on enabled if an connection is auqired from the pool.
      static java.lang.String FETCH_SCHEMA
      Attribute tag which may be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the schemas needs to be fetched from the Service Provider.
      static java.lang.String MULTIVALUE_SEPARATOR
      Attribute tag which may be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the character that separates multiple values for the same entry tag name.
      static java.lang.String ROW_NUMBER_ATTRIBUTE
      Attribute tag which must be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the pseudo column used by paged resultsets.
      static java.lang.String SYSTEM_TIMESTAMP
      Attribute tag which must be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the database statement to obtain the current timestamp from the database.

    • Field Detail

      • FETCH_SCHEMA

        static final java.lang.String FETCH_SCHEMA
        Attribute tag which may be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the schemas needs to be fetched from the Service Provider.

        Default: false

        Constant Field Values

      • ENFORCE_AUTO_COMMIT

        static final java.lang.String ENFORCE_AUTO_COMMIT
        Attribute tag which must be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify that the JDBC Auto Commit feature needs stay on enabled if an connection is auqired from the pool.

        This feature is only necessary to support DB2. This stupid database still needs a commit after each select to remove the read locks from the page.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROW_NUMBER_ATTRIBUTE

        static final java.lang.String ROW_NUMBER_ATTRIBUTE
        Attribute tag which must be defined on a Metadata Descriptor to specify the pseudo column used by paged resultsets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
